scripts.build:images: export BASE_IMAGE_SUFFIX=shipoff/base-image && docker build -t $BASE_IMAGE_SUFFIX:nodejs-static -f ./src/images/Dockerfile.node.static ./src/images/ && docker build -t $BASE_IMAGE_SUFFIX:nodejs-dynamic -f ./src/images/Dockerfile.node.dynamic ./src/images/ && docker build -t $BASE_IMAGE_SUFFIX:python-dynamic -f ./src/images/Dockerfile.python.dynamic ./src/images && docker build -t $BASE_IMAGE_SUFFIX:php-dynamic -f ./src/images/Dockerfile.php.dynamic ./src/images
